packages.title: ALL-DAY PASS : Adult
tags: Buy a daypass and climb at ATTIC V as long as you want all day. Even leave and come back later.

packages.title: ALL-DAY PASS :  Student aged 18 or under
tags: Buy a daypass and climb at ATTIC V as long as you want all day. Even leave and come back later.

packages.title: 10 VISITS, ONE PERSON - Adult
tags: If all 10 visits are used up before the end of the first month, additional visits for the rest of the first month will be free.

packages.title: 10 VISITS, ONE PERSON - Student aged over 18
tags: If all 10 visits are used up before the end of the first month, additional visits for the rest of the first month will be free.

packages.title: 10 VISITS, ONE PERSON - Student aged 18 or under
tags: If all 10 visits are used up before the end of the first month, additional visits for the rest of the first month will be free.
